Consider the following data on [World Migration](https://www.dropbox.com/s/f8t1p37kkueizom/migration.csv?dl=0) from the United Nations, Department of Economic and Social Affairs, Population Division, Trends in International Migrant Stock.

Questions to be answered visually (no restrictions!):



* Which countries and regions have the most people leaving?  Where do they go?
* Which countries and regions have the most people entering?  Where do they come from?
